p: In the particular Italian QX scenario, the serially sampled (i.e. with known collection date) strains were used to infer the migration rate and history between the two integrated poultry companies (i.e. considered as different demes) over time. Additionally, the Bayesian approach implemented in BEAST allowed to contextually estimate other population parameters, including the time to most recent common ancestor (tMRCA), evolutionary rate and population size.
